item.title: Step 4 RSO Announcement
item.description: Greetings all, We’re very happy to announce that the Stevens Cyber Defense Team has met all the requirements to be considered a Step 4 Registered Student Organization (RSO) within Stevens! This means that we are a probationary RSO, and are given a budget and several other perks. That’s not important to everyone else - what is important is that we now have the capability to run bigger and better meetings, and run them more often.
